text: Arrigo Levi (17 July 1926 â€“ 24 August 2020) was an Italian journalist, essayist, and television anchorman. He was born in Modena, Italy. He was a news anchor for Channel 5. From 1979 to 1983 he collaborated with The Times, editing its international section. In 1988 he was appointed Chief Editor of Corriere della Sera. Levi died on 24 August 2020 in his hometown Modena at the age of 94. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Italian journalists Category:Television news anchors Category:Italian essayists
